Name: Vocabulaire de Transferts de chaleur
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions of thermodynamic terms available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Janes corpus n-grams 1.0
Description: This is a list of n-grams extracted from the Janes corpus of Slovenian user-generated content version 1.0. The resource is available for download from CLARIN.SI

Name: Multilingual Flashcards with 4,000 Most Common Icelandic Words (IceFlash4K)
Description:
This wordlist contains common Icelandic words in 4 languages English, Chinese, Polish, Ukrainian.
The wordlist is available for download from the CLARIN-IS repository.

Name: Finnish Verbal Colorative Constructions
Description: This is a wordlist that contains Finnish verbal “colorative” (i.e., stylistically marked) constructions­. The resource is available for download through FIN-CLARIN.

Name: Vocabulaire d'archéologie
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of archaeology available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Vocabulaire de Psychopathologie
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of psychopathology available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: SentimentWortschatz
Description:
This is a is a publicly available German-language resource for sentiment analysis, opinion mining etc. It lists positive and negative polarity bearing words weighted within the interval of [-1; 1] plus their part of speech tag and base form.
The wordlist is available from the CLARIN B-centre SAW Leipzig.

Name: Frequency List of Written Finnish Word Forms
Description: This is a frequency lexicon of Finnish word forms that appear in the Finnish Parole text corpus. The resource is available online through FIN-CLARIN.

Name: Deutscher Wortschatz
Description: This resource provides a list of annotated words taken from the deu_newscrawl_2011 corpus. The resource is available for online browsing through CLARIN-D/University of Leipzig.

Name: Swedish words, LEXIN
Description: This is a word list to be used by immigrants to Sweden. The resource can be download from the SWE-CLARIN repository.

Name: LCM-PL
Description: This is a wordlist that list the frequencies and abstract levels of verbs. The resource is available for download from the CLARIN-PL repository.

Name: Frequency Lexicon of the Finnish Newspaper Language
Description: This is a frequency lexicon available online through FIN-CLARIN.

Name: Maltese Wordlist
Description: This is a wordlist used for spell-checking. It is available for download from CLARIN PORTULAN.

Name: Word frequency list from the Icelandic Corpus for Academic Words (v. 1.0)
Description: This is a frequence list from MÍNO, which is a language corpus of academic vocabulary. The wordlist is available for download from the CLARIN-IS consortium.

Name: Vocabulaire d'histoire et sciences de la littérature
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of literary studies available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Vocabulaire d'ethnologie
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of ethnology available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Estonian Frequency Dictionary (ver. 2.0)
Description: This is a frequency list available for download from META-SHARE (CELR distribution) and for online browsing.

Name: Frequency list of textbook vocabulary by level of education in elementary and secondary schools
Description:
The dataset contains a list of 11906 words (lemmas with part of speech information) and their frequency of occurrence in a corpus of Slovenian textobooks, covering elementary school (Grade 1 to 9) and secondary school (Year 1 to 4). The corpus contains 4,302,857 words (5,373,268 tokens), and consists of 127 textbooks from 16 different subjects.
The purpose of the dataset is to facilitate research into vocabularly use at different levels of education, and to enable comparative studies of student language reception and production in Slovene.
This resource is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Name: Vocabulaire de philosophie
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions of philosophical terms available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: IMP corpus n-grams 2.0
Description: This is a list of n-grams extracted from the IMP corpus of historical Slovene download from CLARIN.SI.

Name: Frequencies of Early Modern Finnish Words
Description: This is a frequency lexicon that consists of words from the Old Literary Finnish text corpus. The resource is available online through FIN-CLARIN.

Name: KELLY word-list Greek
Description: This wordlist is useful for learning and teaching Greek as a foreign/second language. The words are classified according to the language levels of CEFR. The resource is available for download from clarin:el.

Name: Names of Countries
Description: This is a wordlist that is based on the Estonian orthography of foreign place names. The resource is available for online browsing.

Name: NyLLex
Description:
This is a frequency list derived from books published by Sweden's largest publisher of easy language texts.
The entries are annotated with frequency counts distributed over six reading proficiency levels. Each entry in the resource contains a word, its part-of-speech tag (SUC-style), and a number of frequencies over different readability levels. Multi-word expressions are denoted by multiple words linked by underscores.
The list is available for download from the Swedish Language Bank.

Name: Vocabulaire de préhistoire et protohistoire
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions historical terms available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Vocabulaire de Pathologies humaines
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of medicine (pathological diseases) available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: The Swedish N-grams 1770-1940 of the Newspaper and Periodical Corpus of the National Library of Finland
Description: This frequency list contains sets of unigrams, bigrams and trigrams extracted from a corpus compiled by the University of Helsinki from the digitized newspapers from the National Library of Finland. The resource is available for download from FIN-CLARIN.

Name: Ngbugu digital wordlist: Archival form
Description: This is a wordlist used in language documentation, phonetics and lexicography. The resource is available for download from Ortolang.

Name: Vocabulaire de Nutrition artificielle
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of nutrition available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: JRC-Names - a multilingual named entity resource
Description: This is a wordlist of named entities (person and organisation names). The resource is available for download from clarin:el.

Name: Vocabulaire d'art et archéologie
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from fine arts and archaeology available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Vocation list (2015-01-10)
Description: This is a wordlist of vocations in Swedish. The resource can be download from the SWE-CLARIN repository.

Name: Maltese Fiction Wordlist
Description: This is a wordlist from 32 fictional books available for download from CLARIN PORTULAN.

Name: Vocabulaire de Transfusion sanguine
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of medicine (related to blood transfusion) available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: The Icelandic Academic Word List (v. 1.0)
Description: This is a frequence list from MÍNO, which is a language corpus of academic vocabulary. The wordlist is available for download from the CLARIN-IS consortium.

Name: Frequency lists for Icelandic 23.06
Description: This is a frequency list for three Icelandic corpora: the Icelandic Parsed Historical Corpus, the Tagged Icelandic Corpus, and the Icelandic Gigaword Corpus. The wordlist is available for download from the CLARIN-IS repository.

Name: Relative frequencies of part-of-speech n-grams in native and translated Finnish literary prose
Description: This is a frequency list of N-grams appearing in the corpus Classics of English and American Literature, English-Finnish parallel corpus and the corpus of Translated Finnish. The resource is available for download from FIN-CLARIN.

Name: Lexical functions of Spanish verb-noun collocations
Description: This is a wordlist that consists of the most frequent 1000 verb-noun pairs extracted automatically from the Spanish Web Corpus classifications (collocation vs. free-word-combo). The resource is available for download from Ortolang.

Name: INT Historical Word List
Description: This wordlist includes historical lexemes for the period between 1550 and 1970. The resource is available for download from the Dutch Language Institute (INT).

Name: Frequencies of Old Literary Finnish Words
Description: This is a frequency lexicon that is constituted of words from Old Literary Finnish text corpus. The resource is available online through FIN-CLARIN.

Name: Vocabulaire d'histoire des sciences et des techniques
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain technical sciences available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Vocabulaire de géographie de l'Amérique du Nord
Description: This is a thesaurus of terms from the geography of North America available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Psycholinguistic Descriptives
Description: This is a frequency wordlist (accompanied by a query tool) of acquiring commonly used psycholinguistic descriptives for Finnish words, and word surface form frequencies, lemma frequencies, syllable frequencies and letter n-gram frequencies. The resource is available for download from FIN-CLARIN.

Name: Vocabulaire d'Electronique et électro-optique
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of electronics available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Kres corpus n-grams 2.0
Description: This is a list of n-grams extracted from the Kres corpus of written Slovenian. The resource is available for download from CLARIN.SI

Name: Vocabulaire d'Histoire et sciences des religions
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of philosophy and religion available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: The Finnish N-grams 1820-2000 of the Newspaper and Periodical Corpus of the National Library of Finland
Description: This is a frequency list that contains sets of unigrams, bigrams and trigrams extracted from a newspaper corpus. The resource is available for download from FIN-CLARIN.

Name: Vocabulaire de sociologie
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of sociology available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Topics of library and information science
Description: This is a word list of terms from the domain of library and information science. The resource is available for download from clarin:el.

Name: Vocabulaire de Sciences de l'éducation
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of education available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Kelly (2017-10-16)
Description: This is a list of keywords for Language Learning for Young and adults alike. The resource can be download from the SWE-CLARIN repository and can be queried online through KARP.

Name: Gos corpus n-grams 2.0
Description: This is a list of n-grams extracted from the Gos corpus of spoken Slovene for download from CLARIN.SI

Name: Vocabulaire de Sciences du langage
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of linguistics available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Vocabulaire de sciences de la Terre
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of expressions from the domain of geology available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Λεξικό Γλωσσολογικών όρων: Γερμανικά – Ελληνικά - Αγγλικά (lexicon of linguistic terms: DE-EL-EN)
Description: This is a wordlist of linguistic terms that is available for download from clarin:el.

Name: Labial vibrants in Mangbetu: Archival form
Description: This is a wordlist of lexical items that exemplify occurrences of bilabial trills and the labiodental flaps. The resource is available for download from ORTOLANG.

Name: Idioms from the NEO lexicon DB
Description: This is a wordlist of idioms with explanations extracted from the database for the dictionary Nationalencyklopediens ordbok. The resource can be download from the SWE-CLARIN.

Name: The Conceptual File of Estonian Lexis of the Institute of Estonian Language
Description: This is a controlled vocabulary of several more-and-less related concepts (e.g., gardening, haymaking, weather, fishing, religion). The resource is available for online browsing.

Name: Modern Finnish Word List
Description: This is a wordlist of contemporary general vocabulary that is available for download through FIN-CLARIN.
